sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-layout class="layout">
    <a-layout-content style="padding: 24px">
      <a-card title="新用户注册" :bordered="false">
        <a-form
          ref="registerForm"
          :form="form"
          :rules="rules"
          @submit="handleSubmit"
          layout="vertical"
        >
          <a-form-item
            name="username"
            label="新用户名"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input
              v-model:value="form.username"
              placeholder="请输入新用户名"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            name="password"
            label="密码"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input-password
              v-model:value="form.password"
              placeholder="请输入密码"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            name="confirm"
            label="确认密码"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input-password
              v-model:value="form.confirm"
              placeholder="请确认密码"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            name="employeeKey"
            label="员工密钥（可选）"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
          >
            <a-input
              v-model:value="form.employeeKey"
              placeholder="请输入员工密钥"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            name="phone"
            label="手机号（可选）"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
          >
            <a-input v-model:value="form.phone" placeholder="请输入手机号" />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item :wrapperCol="{ span: 24, offset: 0 }">
            <a-button type="primary" htmlType="submit">提交注册</a-button>
            <a-button style="margin-left: 8px" @click="handleCancel"
              >取消注册</a-button
            >
          </a-form-item>
        </a-form>
      </a-card>
    </a-layout-content>
  </a-layout>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from "vue";
import { Form, Input, Button, Card, Layout } from "ant-design-vue";
import { useForm } from "@ant-design/vue/es/form";

export default defineComponent({
  components: {
    "a-layout": Layout,
    "a-layout-content": Layout.Content,
    "a-card": Card,
    "a-form": Form,
    "a-form-item": Form.Item,
    "a-input": Input,
    "a-input-password": Input.Password,
    "a-button": Button,
  },
  setup() {
    const form = useForm();

    const rules = {
      username: [
        { required: true, message: "请输入新用户名", trigger: "blur" },
      ],
      password: [{ required: true, message: "请输入密码", trigger: "blur" }],
      confirm: [
        { required: true, message: "请确认密码", trigger: "blur" },
        {
          validator(_, value) {
            if (!value || value === form.getFieldValue("password")) {
              return Promise.resolve();
            }
            return Promise.reject(new Error("两次输入的密码不一致"));
          },
        },
      ],
      employeeKey: [{ required: false }],
      phone: [
        {
          required: false,
          pattern: /^1[3-9]\d{9}$/,
          message: "请输入正确的手机号",
        },
      ],
    };

    const handleSubmit = (values) => {
      console.log("Received values of form: ", values);
      // 这里可以添加表单提交逻辑
    };

    const handleCancel = () => {
      // 这里可以添加取消逻辑
      form.resetFields();
    };

    return {
      form,
      rules,
      handleSubmit,
      handleCancel,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style scoped>
.layout {
  height: 100vh;
}
</style>
